title: SleepWell: Rate and Improve Your Quality of Sleep
shortDescription: Deep learning-based drowsiness detection system integrated with mobile application for sleep quality monitoring
fullDescription: Developed an end-to-end drowsiness detection system using Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN) to analyze facial features and detect drowsiness in real-time. The model is integrated into a mobile application built with Android Studio (Kotlin) and RESTful API for seamless user experience. The system helps users monitor their sleep quality and provides recommendations for better sleep habits.
highlights: Achieved 90%+ accuracy in drowsiness detection using CNN
Successfully integrated ML model with Android mobile application
Implemented RESTful API for model inference and data management
Real-time facial feature analysis for drowsiness detection
Capstone project completed as part of Bangkit Academy program

title: E-Commerce Marketplace Platform
shortDescription: Multi-role marketplace system with admin, seller, and buyer functionalities built with Laravel
fullDescription: Built a comprehensive e-commerce marketplace platform using Laravel and MySQL with three distinct user roles: Admin, Seller, and Buyer. The system features product management, shopping cart functionality, order processing through admin approval, and an inbox notification system. Developed collaboratively as a team of 4 members with full CRUD operations for all entities.
highlights: Implemented multi-role authentication system (Admin, Seller, Buyer)
Built shopping cart with add-to-cart functionality
Developed order management with admin approval workflow
Created inbox notification system for order updates
Collaborative development with 4-member team

title: Portal Layanan Perumahan Miskin
shortDescription: Government housing service portal with hierarchical admin system for managing low-income housing data
fullDescription: Developed a comprehensive housing service portal using Laravel and MySQL for managing low-income housing programs. The system features hierarchical role-based access control with Super Admin and Regional Admin roles. Regional admins can manage their assigned areas, including CRUD operations for regions, households (KK), houses, and housing reports. The portal serves as a centralized platform for government housing data management and monitoring.
highlights: Implemented hierarchical role-based access control (Super Admin & Regional Admin)
Built comprehensive CRUD system for regions, households, houses, and reports
Developed regional data management for localized housing administration
Created public visitor interface for housing service information
Academic project completed as part of Web Programming course

title: Modern Portfolio Website
shortDescription: Sleek and modern portfolio website built with Next.js 15 and shadcn/ui components
fullDescription: Built a contemporary portfolio website using the latest web technologies including Next.js 15, React 19, TypeScript, and shadcn/ui. Features smooth animations with Framer Motion, dark/light theme toggle with next-themes, and JSON-driven content management for easy updates. The design is inspired by modern crypto analytics platforms with a focus on clean aesthetics and user experience.
highlights: Built with Next.js 15 and React 19 for optimal performance
Fully responsive design with smooth Framer Motion animations
JSON-driven content architecture for easy maintenance
Dark/light theme with seamless transitions
Modern UI inspired by Token Terminal and Arkham Intelligence
